price: He seeks to drive you out of your land. [Pharaoh said], “So what do you advise?”
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
